name: EMBRACE THE VOID
description:
EMBRACE THE VOID is a free stress-relief game about tossing the anxieties of modern life into the void.

Set in college student Anna’s home, a black hole suddenly opens and threatens to devour everything around her. The player must feed the void’s insatiable hunger in order to embrace it and not be overtaken. Objects representing the anxieties of modern life can be thrown in, such as a buzzing phone, student loan debt, and political anger.

We were inspired to create this game after the anxiety-inducing news cycle that 2017 has been, and it is intended as a cathartic release for anyone needing a few moments to toss their stresses into the abyss.
